## Checklist

### Before Requesting Review
- [ ] I have tested this locally
- [ ] I have added/updated tests (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines

### Deployment Safety
- [ ] This has been deployed to **staging/test** environment
- [ ] Staging validation passed (manual or automated)
- [ ] No PII is logged or exposed
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials

### Linear Sync (if spec changes)
- [ ] Specs in `.kiro/specs/` are up to date
- [ ] Linear stories synced: `npm run sync:linear`
